message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $18000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the effort, but I am only willing to pay $16000 for it.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17500. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still unable to pay $17500 for the product. My maximum offer remains at $16000.
